text.section:
The issuance, denial, or modification of a certification:
shall be made by the Department; and
may be reviewed by the Department's board of review.
Local enforcement agency representatives, manufacturers, and installers of industrialized buildings may seek review by the Department of the issuance or denial of a certification.

Any alteration, modification, or attempted use of an industrialized building beyond the scope of the certification results in forfeiture of the certification and insignia unless approval for the modification or use is secured from the Department in advance.
